original_text: Above the vault over their heads was what looked like a throne of lapis lazuli, and high above on the throne was a figure like that of a man.
korean_text: 그 머리 위에 있는 궁창 위에 보좌의 형상이 있는데 그 모양이 남보석 같고 그 보좌의 형상 위에 한 형상이 있어 사람의 모양 같더라

sentences.original_text: Above the vault over their heads
was what looked like a throne of lapis lazuli
and high above on the throne
was a figure like that of a man
